title: Youth held for attempt to rape child
body: A youth was arrested on charge of his attempt to rape a 6-year-old girl at Companiganj upazila in Sylhet on Wednesday. Arrested Delwar Hossain alias Abdul Masabbir, 21, is son of Fakhrul Alam of Dakghar village in the Companiganj upazila, police said. Local people said that Delwar took away the victim from her house to a lonely place at around 2:00pm and tried to rape her there. Hearing her screaming, the neighbours rescued the child from the spot and confined Delwar from there. Companiganj police station officer-in-charge Md Ratan Sheikh said that the perpetrator was arrested. ‘The victim was admitted to the Companiganj Upazila Health Complex,’ he said in the evening, adding that filing of a case in this regard was underway.
